name:D‚Äçm‚Äçi‚Äçt‚Äçr‚Äçi‚Äçi
info:Premier Room - Sea-View
info:Stayed in May 2024
info:Couples
info:1 Review
rating:5
posted:Posted May 27, 2024
msg:A great cozy hotel, with a large beautiful territory. It is equally suitable for a family holiday and for a romantic one. Concerts are organized for fans of parties, and if you want silence, there is also a place to retire. In addition to the standard set, there are beach slippers and a beach bag (you can not take extra pounds with you). There is even a petting zoo on the 1st floor. There is a separate organized space for children. There are many places for walking within walking distance. Of the 2 restaurants for breakfast, I liked Pin Ju Hainan Restaurant the most. The beach bar makes excellent kebabs. The sea is clean and calm. Yalong Bay beach is clean, the waves are rare and not big. We were from May 11, 2024 to May 24, there were no jellyfish or plankton, we swam for days, no one bit)). The service is 5+, the staff knows their business. I would like to express special thanks to Dorothy's manager. A super tactful professional. She helped us a lot in solving various issues, warned us, advised us, and promptly resolved all issues that arose. We have not met such managers for as long as we travel. I would give Dorothy the award: "best manager of the year." Special thanks to Dorothy for your attention. In general, by all criteria (beach holidays, medicine, shopping, entertainment), I liked Hainan more than Phuket, the Philippines and Turkey. The climate is very comfortable, at a temperature of +33-35, we did not die from the heat, apparently due to optimal humidity. We will definitely come back)))
----------------------------------------

name:G‚Äçu‚Äçe‚Äçs‚Äçt‚Äç ‚ÄçU‚Äçs‚Äçe‚Äçr
info:Lagoon Room
info:Stayed in March 2024
info:Couples
info:1 Review
rating:5
posted:Posted March 23, 2024
msg:I booked the hotel for my 3 days holiday.   I would say this was a memorable experience for me at MGM.   It has a great location at Yalong Bay, with just a few minutes walk to the beach.   The outdoor of the hotel looks like a waterworld park, with a lot of swimming & sunbathing places, and even a small water playground for kids.   I enjoyed the surf experience in the hotel.  Room was very clean, and tidy, and up to standard.   We were staying in the lagoon room, with a swimming pool in the front.   The pool water was very clean.   The breakfast buffet includes a wide variety of both Western and Chinese foods.   Staff were super nice and really helpful especially Jelly Shen, who ensured a smooth transition of our room.   She provided the flexibility and arranged different outdoor activities for us since we are not good in mandarin, and also provided sightseeing advices within the area.   In these 3 days, she was more like a friend of us, provided exceptional support for our need.   This was one of our best travel experience we had ever.  I would highly recommended to stay here for those who like water activities or with kids.

msg:Our family visited China from Canada, and our stay at MGM was the highlight of our trip, largely thanks to Jelly Shen. Despite language barriers, Jelly's exceptional service made us feel incredibly comfortable and welcomed, almost like having a friend by our side. The hotel itself is stunning, with easy access to both the pool and the beach. Everything was immaculately clean, and the resort's restaurants offered delicious dining experiences. The only minor hiccup was a slightly delayed check-in, which, after a long commute, was a bit inconvenient. Nevertheless, I would highly recommend MGM - it's one of the best resorts I've stayed in worldwide. Thank you, Jelly, for being our friend away from home.

msg:Just an okay hotel. Absolutely nothing special for a western couple. Restaurants on site pretty average, and mainly to a Chinese taste, which is to be expected. Breakfast was a particular low point, very greasy and oily, western options lacking. It also had a very chaotic vibe and wasn‚Äôt a very relaxing breakfast experience. Lot of smoking around the pool area which again being in China is to be expected but I‚Äôd expect a 5 star resort to have dedicated areas especially with the amount of children around the pool. Pool itself was warm and clean, with good sun-beds. In house prices for alcoholic drinks were also excellent, but the bar staff often did not seem to know how to make cocktails. This happened in more than one on site bar where I‚Äôd receive my beer, but my partners cocktail would take so long to arrive that I would have already finished my drink. Not really much to do on site, most events again are geared towards a Chinese crowd which is to be expected but being a international resort I expected a bit more of a middle ground on this, but instead it‚Äôs people in huge inflatable bear suits walking around really killing the 5 star resort vibe. I would not rush back, it was a okay experience but certainly not a 5 star one, just felt like there was not much going on and certainly not a hotel for the western audience, that is if you want a palatable breakfast for your tastes.

msg:MGM was the third and last hotel on an 8-day trip to Sanya. The hotel is beautiful: room design, bar, landscaping, pool areas, beach. The breakfast was divine with many choices. Candy (front desk) was amazing during our stay. She was very attentive, professional and helpful. She helped make the stay great! Thank you, Candy! My daughter loved the zip line, surfing, beach, and photography experience. MGM has many opportunities to have fun and keep busy, while offering many places to just relax and chill. The bar staff and breakfast staff were very attentive and added to our lovely experience. The only recommendation I would have for management is to place felt chair leg pads on room chairs. The noise of neighboring guests and upstairs guests scraping wooden furniture along the floor can ruin a very nice moment in one's room. Please consider this small request so that such unnecessary noise can be eliminated. I look forward to visiting MGM again. :)

name:Y‚Äça‚Äçn‚Äça‚Äç ‚ÄçB‚Äçr‚Äço‚Äçu‚Äçg‚Äçh
info:Premier Room - Sea-View
info:Stayed in March 2023
info:Family
info:9 Reviews
rating:5
posted:Posted March 12, 2023
msg:Staff: we arrived at MGM and were instantly greeted by the friendly staff. Staff member Link was especially helpful and gave us 5 stars service.everyone was friendly and always gave us a warm welcome.
rooms: decent size and always cleaned; it was nice to see that cleaning products were refreshed daily. Our parents had a room next door to ours- somehow they were receiving fresh fruit daily whereas we only got twice during the whole week. view of the ocean is quite decent.
Location: perfect.
Entertainment: ideal for family. the fireshow was one of our favorites. Outside the breakfast buffet was a clown and also a kids world that they can enjoy. Decent Live music often with meals or when near the pool chilling.
Restaurant/food: the breakfast and dinner buffet is good, but the general lunch time restaurants and lunch snacks could use an upgrade (very fatty foods that are overly cooked in oil or lacking a bit of flavor).
Facilities: well kept and actually quite a few activities for  the family. Kiddie pool area was also decent. They even have a cocktail bar close to the beach.

name:G‚Äçu‚Äçe‚Äçs‚Äçt‚Äç ‚ÄçU‚Äçs‚Äçe‚Äçr
info:Superior Ocean-view Room
info:Stayed in August 2021
info:Couples
info:8 Reviews
rating:5
posted:Posted August 14, 2021
msg:üìçlocation: The hotel is located perfectly in the middle of Yalong Bay. It has direct beach access with life guard, a beach bar and sunbeds at the beach. The pool is also good, just a bit shallow but very big with many options to play volleyball, basketball or just lounge around (and a pool bar üçπ). 

üõé service: Honestly the best service we have had in China! Everyone was friendly and helpful. Many members of staff also speak at least a little English. We even had our own butler service (on Wechat). 

üç≥ food: We tried the breakfast buffet, pool bar snacks and room service. Everything was delicious! The breakfast was extremely diverse with many Chinese and Western options. We loved the food! 

üõè room: We had a superior room with sea view. The layout of the room was very spacious with the bathroom behind the bed and even a walk-in closet (every girl‚Äòs dream üòç). 

ü§π‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏è entertainment: This is something that wasn‚Äòt too important to us but it was still nice to have and I think if you have children, you would love the options. There was some kids entertainment at breakfast everyday (clowns, balloon artists or stilt walkers), which was great to watch and prevented kids from being bored and running around - great idea! Every evening there was a singer/pianist duo who either performed at the pool side BBQ or in the hotel bar. There were many other options, for example go cart, surfing wave, bouncy castle in the sea - there is really something for everyone! 

We loved the hotel so much that we had to extend one night because we didn‚Äòt want to leave üòÇ I would 100% recommend! üòÅ

----------------------------------------
name:C‚Äçy‚Äçc‚Äçl‚Äçi‚Äçn‚Äçg‚Äç ‚ÄçF‚Äça‚Äçm‚Äçi‚Äçl‚Äçy‚Äç ‚ÄçM‚Äça‚Äçn
info:Garden Family Friendly Room (Balcony)
info:Stayed in June 2021
info:Family
info:22 Reviews
rating:3.7
posted:Posted June 23, 2021
msg:The facilities are nice but there are some glaring customer service issues. 

Our family of four stayed here for 6 nights and thoroughly enjoyed the pool and easy access to the beach. The garden family friendly room with a balconly. We ate the buffet breakfast each morning and bought the "Gourmet Treat" package which offered lunch at the Silk, afternoon tea and buffet dinner + a show next to the pool. The hotel is located in the resort section on Sanya in Yalong Bay. There is a small town nearby with local food and fast food options as well as shopping. 

We will not return to this hotel.
Our major issue is that they offer a shuttle service to the airport. We spent more than 30 minutes filling out a form that was all in chinese to secure our spot. Two days later on the morning we were flying out they told us that they couldn't confirm our reservation and the bus was now full. So we were forced to reserve an earlier shuttle that would get us to the airport several hours too early. We canceled some of our plans because we now had to leave early. Upon arrival, the shuttke bus we were scheduled to use was also full and not one of the staff could explain what happened to our seat reservations. We ended up taking a Didi for ¬•100 to the airport to avoid anymore headache with this situation. This experience was very frustrating and made us decide to not come back to this hotel again. 

The Room:
It is huge! It had a kids space with a small tent and Minion themed decor. The shower is large and separate from the toilet and there is a big bath tub. The balcony was a good size and overlooked a small pool and green area. The room was very quiet and met our needs. 

The Breakfast
They made an attempt to offer Western options by providing, premade waffles/pancakes, an omelet station, fried eggs, cereal, cheese, bread/toast, and coffee machines. There are also lots of local options such as a soup station, noodles, steamed buns, sweet sausages, boiled and baked eggs, porridge, and fruit. 

The Gourmet Treat:
The kids really enjoyed the tea time as it includes lots of fancily decorated sweets and they liked to try each one. The lunch at Silk was very good and the service was good. It fed the whole family and included two soups, grouper, fried shrimp, clams, picked and steamed veggies and stir fried mushrooms. Just be careful about ordering anything beyond the set menu as they will charge you for it. We ordered some watermelon juice for the kids and two small glasses cost us $13.50. 

The minor Issues we had.
We were in contact with a hotel representative to make entertainment reservations. She was very helpful at first but then she stopped responding to messages for days at a time and then was very inconsistent with her responses.
The next issue we had was the staff ignoring the do not disturb sign. They walked in while the kids were sleeping and pretty much insisted on making up the room on several other occasions. We don't really need new towels each day and can make our own beds so we kept the sign up but they kept pushing in.

Some of the facilities are damaged or out of order. The floor of the kids' water park is severely distorted and cracked. My kids kept tripping on it and we are not having fun. They advertise an obstacle course out in the ocean but it was closed the whole time we were there. The children's block area is designed for babies. 

My last complaint is at the beach the life guard was overprotective. There is a designated swimming area blocked off by rope and bouys and if you get withing 10 feet of the rope the life guard blows the whistle and uses the megaphone to tell you to get away. This is also annoying when you are trying to relax on the beach. 

We still had a good time but were very disappointed in the service regarding the shuttle bus. 
----------------------------------------

When we arrived, she asked us what we needed. I said that we didn‚Äôt have enough water, and she immediately brought us a lot of water... There was also a fruit plate when we checked in, and there were drinks in the minibar every day, which was great!
The housekeeper also reminded us to go to breakfast early. Fortunately, we went early... The key point is that you must go early, otherwise you have to queue up late, which is embarrassing... The breakfast is not bad. There are two restaurants. We ate in both, and I prefer the Hainan flavor one...
For a parent-child hotel, I am really satisfied. The dolls play a lot and there are many activities. Tongmeng Tiandi is the kind of place where children usually play. The cute pet park opposite is highly recommended... But if you want to interact, you have to pay a ticket. If the doll likes animals, it is highly recommended...
My baby likes it very much. He interacts with the little animals side by side when he goes in. The staff is also super nice and introduces them side by side... There are many super cute ones, such as bunnies, meerkats, chinchillas, and marmots. They are so cute, so cute! The kids loved it...
The next day we also went to the poolside to eat a seafood buffet, which tasted good, but if you want to sit by the pool, remember to go early to reserve a seat...
There are also performances from Tuesday to Sunday, you must watch it‚Äº Ô∏èIt's really amazing, it's very good to watch, if you don't want to eat the buffet, you can also watch it while swimming, very comfortable!
A very good experience, I will come again.

I stayed in 8 five-star hotels on this trip. Although the decoration style of this hotel is slightly conservative and old, the room and butler service experience are the best!
There are children's bathrobes, children's disposable cotton slippers, children's special shampoo and bath products, and the washbasin has a footstool for children and a ready-made absorbent cloth.
The handrails in the bathroom take care of the elderly/disabled people, and there is a place for sitting bathing. The bench for sitting bathing has anti-scratch and anti-kick angles on both the side and the bottom. The designer is very considerate.
The trash can next to the toilet is also placed in the front, where it is very convenient to throw away waste paper, instead of the back.
Disadvantages: Sound insulation seems imperfect, there are few charging sockets at the head of the bed, and the light control panel has a minor fault.
Finally, I would like to praise Kimi Yang. He started to follow up before I checked in, sent me a lot of activity time and maps, helped me upgrade the room type, took the initiative to introduce the night market and food near the hotel, reminded me that parking is free, introduced the breakfast restaurant, and prepared breakfast for us in advance on our last day when we were catching a flight and didn't have time to eat breakfast! By the way, the Corona barbecue on the beach of the hotel tastes really very good! ! The yacht sent to the sea is large and stable, and it is not easy to get seasick.
This trip ended perfectly in mgm.

Advantages: There are fewer betel nut worms than Sanya Bay
The children's floating arm provided by the hotel is very useful
The VIP fruit of the hotel is richer than that of other hotels
You can see the fireworks show of the neighboring hotel at night
There are clown performances at noon and m shows at night to kill time
Now no little lions are given (only a small brooch is given)
All activities are clearly arranged
There is a free train at 17:30
The air conditioner has been turned on in advance before check-in
Disadvantages: There is a lot of garbage on the beach, and there are dead fish
The beach is very steep (the sand is not as fine as Sanya Bay)
Sanya Bay sand crabs are easier to catch (very stupid) See the video for details
You can pick up more shells in Sanya Bay

Here I want to remind everyone that most of the free projects mentioned by Ctrip are available for guests staying in the hotel every day, including indoor and outdoor play, and then the water projects can be booked on the day, because it is based on the wave conditions of the day to decide which projects can be played. I was going to experience it, but I just saw someone drowning in Qingshui Bay Besides, I see that except for the motorboat, most people fall into the sea in other water activities. I am afraid of death, so I dare not try it.

The hotel housekeeper is very considerate and good, the service is good, and the sanitary environment is good

posted:Posted April 8, 2024
msg:The advantages and disadvantages of this hotel are obvious. The advantages are that there are abundant facilities for parent-child entertainment, there are poolside performances at night, and there are many seats on the beach. You can find a lounge chair to sit and watch the sea at any time. We came to play in the first week of April. Due to the strong wind and waves, none of the sea projects included in the hotel package were played, and we could only exchange them for the hotel's afternoon tea package. If these additional projects cannot be played due to seasonal reasons, then I hope they will not be written in the package. Anyway, if they cannot be played, there is no point in giving them to guests. The disadvantage is that there are too many mistakes and negligence in management, which are simply continuous. On the first day of check-in, we were forced to wait for an hour in the room for our luggage, because the swimsuits and equipment were all in the suitcase. Who would have thought that we would have to wait so long? It is recommended that you do not let them send the luggage, and the guests take it into the room by themselves. I added the butler WeChat and asked about the luggage status. The reply was that they were urging us to arrive soon, but I still waited for a long time. Later, the butler arranged to send fruit to the room to express his condolences. The next day we went out at 10 o'clock and hung a sign outside the door saying "clean immediately". However, when we returned to the room after 1 o'clock to rest, the room was not cleaned. We asked the housekeeper to arrange someone to clean it, so we could not rest and had to go out again to facilitate the staff to clean the room. What's more, on the day we left the hotel, we took the hotel bus. After arriving at the destination, we found that the concierge did not load our three suitcases on the bus. We called to ask, and their first reaction was to blame me for not showing them the luggage ticket. At that time, we and our luggage were at the door of the bus. They asked us to get on the bus. Our luggage tags were all on the luggage. They did not let us show them the luggage ticket stub. Isn't this a standard inspection process? And isn't the luggage on the standard bus guest? Negligence is one aspect, but why is the first reaction to blame the guest when there is a problem? Is this attitude reasonable? Finally, the housekeeper sent a car to deliver our luggage, and we could only wait until the luggage arrived. If you take a plane at the airport, can't you delay the check-in? In short, during the stay, the hotel made continuous mistakes and did not correct them after repeated warnings. This should be a problem at the management level of the hotel. We hope to make improvements to reduce the inconvenience caused to guests, wasted time and unnecessary communication costs.

msg:MGM Sanya
The first stop of this trip to Sanya was Yalong Bay. After careful selection, I chose MGM. After all, it is more convenient to be connected to the beach.

First of all, when you check in, the lady at the front desk has a very good service attitude. She is gentle, meticulous and quick. Order one.

However, the check-in room was provided by an intern, and the service attitude was hard to describe. I was really shocked. Is this the service attitude that was so praised in the MGM comment section?

Fortunately, the follow-up butler Jerry helped solve the problem and tried his best to restore the impression of MGM. His service was indeed very attentive‚ûïmeticulous.

He also took us around the whole park and introduced the characteristics of each place, such as meals, etc., including some reservation services. He also helped us. Give Jerry a thumbs up.

Let‚Äôs talk about the hotel hardware.
It is indeed old, but not old. It can be seen that the hotel is carefully managed and maintained.
The basics such as wet and dry separation/bathtub/small refrigerator are all in place. I booked a swimming pool room on the first floor. The swimming pool will be cleaned regularly every day, but there are inevitably a lot of mosquitoes. I hope this can be added. strengthen

Everything else is quite satisfactory. The private beach is also connected with other hotels. I would like to say that the sand in Yalong Bay is still not as fine as Haitang Bay. I always feel that it is different from when I came here a few years ago.

p.s. I didn‚Äôt touch the child facilities in the hotel. After all, I came here with my friends. The hotel is still suitable for families with children...there are so many children...

He informed me of the hotel's map, activities, and hotel rights one day in advance. After I checked in, he informed me of the dining and hotel performances, etc. They also gave me a souvenir when I left the hotel. It gives people the feeling of making a deal. There will be waiters to help with luggage when entering the hotel, and the front desk also provides standard smile service when checking in.
4. Catering. There are many varieties of breakfast, freshly squeezed juices, and many varieties of fruit pastries. The restaurant environment is good, with high floors and wide seat spacing. The minibar is free on the first day, with coffee options including latte and American style, and cola with or without sugar.
It is impossible to be perfect in the service industry. Here are some suggestions:
1. It is recommended to put a pack of tissue paper on the table in the room instead of just in the bathroom;
2. It is recommended to put bath towels and water dispensers next to the swimming pool (of course there may be, but I didn't see them);
3. It would be even better if there is a Bluetooth speaker in the room.
Finally, send me pictures of the hotel.

Shortly after checking in, we received baby toiletries as well as bathrobes, slippers, and a step board. I have to say, I forgot to ask this, but the front desk was able to surprise me.

In addition, I should mention that the hotel facilities have special children's swimming pools and children's water parks. They are all new and look newly renovated. There are security guards on duty in each swimming pool area. This is a sense of security for us. . Children's swimming pool, children's water park, cute pet park, children's dream world and children's heart park are undoubtedly the children's favorite places, and the most important thing is that these are free to play. In addition to children's activities, adults can relax in the SPA and relieve the fatigue of a long day of travel, as well as yoga, ziplines, go-karts and other activities. When running in the morning, there are many small animals (squirrels, birds, etc.) on the trails of the hotel, which is very comfortable. There are several specialty restaurants in the hotel, the poolside buffet restaurant (there will be a MGM show in the evening), Pinju Restaurant (Hainan specialties), Jinhui Restaurant (Cantonese cuisine), Niwan Seaview Restaurant (seafood restaurant with sea view) , the food is good, the service is also very good, warm and considerate. Let's talk about the hotel's services. When we went through the formalities at the front desk, the front desk staff enthusiastically handled it for us, introduced how to get the activity list and package, and carefully reminded the specific location of some facilities. In the corridor back to the room, the room attendant also greeted me warmly. In the past few days of our stay, the hotel's warm and considerate service has made us feel good about the hotel. On the second day, due to some unhappiness, the lobby manager Xiao Lu solved it for me in time, allowing my family to eliminate the dissatisfaction caused by this small accident. The high efficiency and professionalism of the hotel are worthy of recognition. Before checking in, I was still a little apprehensive when I saw the bad reviews on the Internet, but after checking in, I found that the experience was really great. There is no perfect hotel, no perfect service, but there must be continuous and progressive management. In addition, the hotel also has a special bus that can be sent to some hotels in Haitang Bay for free! ! The porter at the gate helped us make an appoin**ent for the bus. In general, we are very satisfied with the MGM Hotel this time, with complete facilities, thoughtful and considerate service (especially the care and greetings during Xiaolu's period), and various children's activities, which made us spend a very pleasant summer vacation.

msg:During this trip to Sanya, I booked three hotels in Sanya Bay, Yalong Bay, and Haitang Bay. I wanted to experience more. MGM was the second hotel I stayed in. I saw a lot of bad reviews before booking, and I was a little worried, but I was very satisfied after checking in. I want to make MGM a good name!

Facilities: It can be seen that it is an old hotel. It should be considered quite luxurious many years ago. This time I stayed in a full sea view room. The location is very good. The room maintenance is not very old. The double-sided table and dry and wet separation are very convenient. Each room is equipped with an Hermes orange beach bag, which really won my heart.

Environment: The lobby is very cool, and the check-in process is a little slow. Fortunately, the room was cleaned when checking in. I was lucky to check in directly without waiting for the room. I came from Sanya Bay. This is indeed a parent-child hotel. There are too many children. The hotel is very close to the beach. You can feel that the hotel environment is very atmospheric when you go to the beach from the lobby. The swimming pool is not small, and there is surfing. The children are very excited. There are many types of breakfast, and different dishes are changed every day. We went there around 8 o'clock without queuing. The service staff led us to the table and cleared the table in time. There is also a children's dining area that is particularly cute.

Service: Finally, let's talk about the service. In fact, the most important thing about staying in a hotel is the service. Sean, the butler of MGM, called one day in advance to confirm the check-in time and needs and added WeChat. He first sent the hotel introduction and activities. After checking in, Sean introduced the dinner location and sent welcome fruits. Since two adults and one child felt that the big bed was a bit crowded, Sean coordinated to add a bed for us. Thank you very much! On the second day, he would take the initiative to ask us what we needed to add to the room and the cleaning time. On the third day, he reminded us of the check-out fee and helped to delay the check-out. As long as there is a need, Sean can respond and meet it in time. In the end, he also sent a little lion, which made our MGM trip very successful. Thank you butler Sean! ! !

This time, I give full marks to the MGM stay experience because of the service of butler Sean. I will come again in the future!

The parent-child series was taken, and the video was taken The teacher captured the photos very well, and I can‚Äôt see the wallet... The hotel only gave 5 photos, 15 seconds of short video, which is not enough.
       The Yalong Bay government backfilled the sand last year. The beach is not as fine as it used to be. You can still see the original white sand near the hotel. The backfill is yellow sand with more broken shells, which is not as good as the original sand. The hotel's private beach is relatively steep. Fortunately, it is not far from Tianyu. The beach of Tianyu is relatively flat, especially after low tide reveals a large area of ‚Äã‚Äãfine and flat sand, which is especially suitable for digging sand castles. The hotel provides free sand digging tools at the beach, so there is no need to bring your own.
        The swimming pool is divided into the main swimming pool, the bubble party pool, and the children's water park (the children's water park is under maintenance recently, so there is no need to play, there is also a children's park in Tianyu, if you really want to play, just go and rub it cheekily). There are water gun fights and bubble parties in the bubble party swimming pool. The coach is very good at driving the a**osphere. The baby likes the water gun fight the most. There are also gold coins to collect, which can be exchanged for gifts at Children's Dream World (indoor children's playground). There are performances by the pool every night, which is very lively. The sound insulation effect of the room is good, and the room is basically not affected by the bustle outside.
        The location of MGM is quite good. On the first day of my stay, I ate the salt-baked chicken set meal at Pinju Hainan Restaurant. Every dish in the set meal was very suitable for my taste. MGM's breakfast is really average, but it's very convenient to eat around. There is a courier cabinet in front of the lobby. The swim rings will arrive on the same day when you order them on the same day. It is very convenient to order pizza for delivery.
       If you bring children (young age), if you want to live in Yalong Bay, MGM is still a good choice.

msg:I have been to Hainan many times, and the itinerary for this May Day trip is very simple: hotel leisure tour!

First comment on the four restaurants in MGM:
Jinhui Chinese Restaurant: Mainly Cantonese cuisine. Personally, I think the environment, service and dishes are all very good. The price is about the same as the reviews. If you want to eat enough, it should be at least 280 yuan per person.
Pinju Hainan Restaurant: mainly Hainanese dishes, with some Sichuan dishes, the portions are relatively large, and the price is high
Niwan: The location is the best, right next to the beach, I went to have two breakfasts, mainly western food, from the breakfast point of view, the quality should be good
Poolside barbecue buffet: I didn't finish the meal. I wanted to eat at 7:30 on the first night at the hotel. The waiter kindly reminded me that there were not many dishes. I suggest you come back tomorrow night. There are mixed reviews on this restaurant, and the environment by the pool is really average, so I'm not interested in trying it again.

There are many entertainment activities in the hotel, and many swimming pools are not deep. Children with a height of 1.4m do not need to wear swimming rings. There is a beach in the backyard of the hotel. At night, I took my children to dig crabs. Some people took their children to dig crabs. We hired one for 200 yuan and half an hour. We taught the children how to find crab holes and helped three children each dig a crab. Children happy [candy]

MGM will arrange butlers in advance and track services. Like the butler Tina.

In short, the experience of staying in the hotel for two nights is still very good, eating, drinking and having fun can be solved in the hotel.

Friendly reminder: The sundry store opposite Pinju Hainan Restaurant in Building 1 is a rip off. I bought a pair of beach pants for 398 yuan. The brand is Gailang. I checked it online for about 60 yuan. For shopping, you can go to the nearby Baihuagu Commercial Center and walk about 600 meters.

name:G‚Äçu‚Äçe‚Äçs‚Äçt‚Äç ‚ÄçU‚Äçs‚Äçe‚Äçr
info:Garden Family Friendly Room (Balcony)
info:Stayed in May 2023
info:Family
info:9 Reviews
rating:4.5
posted:Posted May 5, 2023
msg:During the May Day holiday, the parent-child room with garden view is booked. This is where I remind everyone to avoid pits. The day before the check-in, the housekeeper called and communicated about the check-in situation and preferences. He said that he wanted to leave a WeChat account and add a WeChat account so that we could get in touch. The phone hung up, and there was nothing else to do. I didn‚Äôt add WeChat when I left the store. Of course, this was not the case. important. Let‚Äôs talk about the room. The so-called parent-child room is actually a beggar‚Äôs room. If you put a small tent, a small rocking chair, and a few children‚Äôs books in the room, it is considered a parent-child room. That is to say, putting things like tents in any room can become a parent-child room. I made a reservation one month in advance, including telling the housekeeper that I wanted a higher floor, but I got a 2nd floor. Anyway, the parent-child tent can be moved to any room at will. You can put a tent in a room on a high floor and turn it into a parent-child room. . The room facilities are OK, but there are too few hangers. The drinks and food in the refrigerator are said to be free for the first round, but when cleaning the next day, the auntie in the room still replenished them.
The hotel is okay earlier, I don't pay much attention to it, and I can accept it. In order to guide staggered peak dining, two discounts are provided for guests who dine before 8:00, one is a 150 yuan consumption coupon (I didn‚Äôt give it to me, and I didn‚Äôt ask for it) and the other is 75 yuan per person for breakfast for children above 1.2 meters ( I use this).
The swimming pool is quite big, but the fly in the oin**ent is the lack of a swimming pool for children to play in. The swimming pool in the children's area is just a few fountains, lacking water slides, water buckets, and water guns. The massage jets in all the pools are not open.
The bubble party on the day of check-in was well organized with a lucky draw and free snacks. Of course, this is not the norm, only special holidays will be organized.
The concierge made an appoin**ent for a bus to the duty-free shop one day in advance. It departs at 9:20 and waits 10 minutes in advance. This shuttle bus is not from the hotel, but from the duty-free shop. It stops at hotels near Yalong Bay and picks up customers one by one. The driver who got on the bus didn't say anything about the time and arrangement of the return journey, and felt that he would go straight there, regardless of the return. After shopping, I took a taxi back to the hotel by myself.
If the room is not cleaned well when you check in, the front desk will provide you with a self-service afternoon tea snack voucher to eat some snacks and fruits and drink drinks.

name:G‚Äçu‚Äçe‚Äçs‚Äçt‚Äç ‚ÄçU‚Äçs‚Äçe‚Äçr
info:Superior Ocean-view Room
info:Stayed in March 2023
info:Family
info:4 Reviews
rating:5
posted:Posted March 24, 2023
msg:My friend changed the plan temporarily and took my mother to travel. So I chose Yalong Bay, which I have never been to before, and wanted to enjoy the clean water and fine sand.
Because the hotel's ranking is relatively high, I chose MGM and booked for three nights.

Service: It feels very humanized, and the overall customer experience is very good. Tina, the hotel housekeeper, came to contact me one day in advance, and helped arrange room upgrades, asked about the itinerary, and sent a hotel map. If you have any questions during your stay, you can ask Tina for help at any time. Every day, you will ask when the next day is suitable for cleaning. Because the new room type does not have a balcony light, the housekeeper immediately arranged for a floor lamp, which is very considerate.
When checking in, the luggage in advance was taken over by the concierge, and it was sent to the room after the registration number, which was quite convenient.
The room cleaning is really a big praise. It is very clean every day. It may be that we don‚Äôt drink much water, but we still add water for us every day. On the last day, it was quite spectacular and placed in a pyramid shape, which shocked me. Quickly brought two bottles to drink on the road, üòÑ. On the last day, I also made a cute bunny for me. It was so cute that I almost wanted to take it home.
Every service staff has a very good attitude. I didn't bring my takeaway mobile phone, so I asked a young lady in the lobby to help me. She was very enthusiastic and helped me scan the QR code with a smile. It felt very good.
However, there are quite a lot of people at this time, so it took a while to check in.

Environment: backed by mountains, facing the sea. There is Dongrong Food Street within walking distance for eating nearby, and Baihua Valley is 5 minutes away by car, Yalong Bay is there for diving, and it takes about 15 minutes to take a taxi to Baifu Island for snorkeling. It is more convenient than expected. However, some one-day tours do not pick up parts of Yalong Bay, so everyone should take a look at them in advance.

Facilities: There are many guests, but the rooms are quiet. There are many swimming pools, and there are also heated swimming pools. The hotel has its own beach and lounge chairs. Because the weather is cold, there are towels and ginger tea. In the room, there are children's bathrobes and slippers (both plastic and disposable), umbrellas, and a straw basket bag that is convenient for carrying to the beach for residents. Although the bathroom equipment is relatively old because the hotel has been around for a long time, it is still very useful and clean. There is a special take-out cabinet for ordering take-out, so you don't have to go out to find food. There are also performances at the seaside bar at night, so you can listen to them without spending money. There are many places suitable for taking pictures in the hotel, just discover them.

Others: This time I booked a hotel with a free face cream, Bojue travel photography, but unfortunately there are no children, otherwise I can experience more, if I have the opportunity to come to Yalong Bay next time, I will still choose this place.

The elderly and children are very happy to play. I wish the hotel presented a thoughtful little lion doll on the first day, and the children were very happy. The housekeeper, Jerry, is patient and thoughtful, responsive to every request, considerate in service, courteous in hospitality, and high in quality, which fully reflects the management and training of MGM's senior staff. Walking in the hotel park, no matter what kind of problems you encounter, as long as you ask the MGM employees in uniform, "the problem ends with me" to make the guests feel at home. Although the weather is getting colder, the hotel's outdoor heated swimming pools also allow children to find their fun, and there are professionals taking care of each swimming pool. The water temperature will be warmer at noon. The outdoor poolside barbecue is a gluttonous feast. It is not only clean and hygienic, but also has performances by entertainers. At the same time, there are new projects such as lantern viewing, zipline jungle adventure and so on this year. It is the best choice for parents and children to play weekend vacation. Fresh fruit can be delivered to the room every day, with a variety of categories and fresh quality. In the lobby of MGM, whether you meet the general manager or employees, they will guide you warmly and thoughtfully. Children's favorite is the dessert in the chocolate house on the first floor. The desserts in the chocolate house are very good. There are rose lollipops and round chocolates. And coconut lollipops. This year's holiday is really unyielding, and I hope that next year's MGM will give us more surprises.

msg:As I expected, the parent-child hotel is also the MGM of the pet-friendly hotel. The holidays are naturally extremely busy, and there are luggage carts piled up at the door. I asked the luggage clerk from the luggage cart to help unload the luggage~~
Fortunately, the receptionist at the front desk is warm and happy to arrange a room with a good view, but they have to wait for cleaning, and then they say they will give us a free afternoon tea. It is really embarrassing for us to go to get afternoon tea when we are happy. It should not be called afternoon tea. Top Too much is food to satisfy one's hunger, so why not have a little more? I really don‚Äôt think there is anything to eat, a few pieces of cake, a few oranges, a few yolk buns, and water ~ drop in price ~
By the way, the buffet dinner by the pool is also average, but you have to wait in line to get the ingredients that are passable. After the person in front of you has taken ten steaks or ten skewers of squid, you may continue to wait for him to grill. Since it is the main BBQ, it should be more It would be better if there are more people and more grills~ Another example is dross seafood, no crabs, only shrimps and snails, and the shrimps that have not been queued are gone; the child wants to eat chicken wings, but he has not been queued several times , In the end, it can only be considered full, not good. The performance is quite special, the singer is the only one that attracts me, other programs can be considered lively, but the elderly and children should like it.
When I checked in, no one reminded me that some items needed to be reserved. What items did I book for the room type package? As a result, we didn‚Äôt make an appoin**ent for the surfing experience we wanted to play the most. We had to wait for a vacancy on the spot. We waited for 1 hour and 15 minutes~~

Just when I was depressed, the butler Sean contacted me and solved the problem quickly and efficiently, and recorded all the feedback in the book. To be honest, my five-star service is for the butler service. Although I did not enjoy the butler service when I entered the store, but Sean's professionalism is also enough to make our experience perfect on the day we leave the store: admit shortcomings, face them positively, never complain, respond to requests, and take the initiative to provide more services... This is the quality of talents that a five-star hotel should be equipped with, thank you very much.
Of course, MGM still has its good side: as far as the row of old hotels in Yalong Bay is concerned, it is clean, tidy and not old; the hotel is not particularly large, and the rooms are near the beach and the lobby, so it is not far away no matter where you go; it is especially suitable Parent-child, there are many activities for children to play, and they are not boring throughout the day; especially the temperature of the heated swimming pool is slightly higher than other hotels, so very young children are not afraid of the cold; the location is also very close to Baihuagu Commercial Street, so it is easy to go out for food It's very convenient; there are quite a lot of internet celebrities, and it's very suitable for those who like to take pictures and check in. These layouts can be harmoniously integrated with the hotel facilities.

Fun surfing experience for two: Be sure to make an appoin**ent in advance, otherwise you have to wait for other people's space to arrange it for you, it is difficult to wait.

name:C‚Äço‚Äçc‚Äço‚Äçh‚Äçu‚Äça‚Äçm‚Äçe‚Äçi‚Äçt‚Äça‚Äçn‚Äçg

info:2 Reviews

posted:Posted November 20, 2022
msg:After doing a lot of research online, I chose MGM. Among all the resort hotels, MGM not only retains the consistent style of the resort hotel, but also upgrades it according to the preferences of young people. The sea view room is beautiful and elegant, and there is no noise at all. The service of MGM is really warm and good. When we checked in, the butler Jerry warmly received us. When we were waiting for the room, I had a meal somewhere else at noon and was very uncomfortable with vomiting and diarrhea. Jerry came to find me as soon as possible and helped me store my luggage and took us to have afternoon tea and rest. I was very touched.
The hotel has a shuttle bus to the duty-free shop. The only bad thing is that the shuttle bus is very rare. There are only three trips on the way there and two trips on the way back. I missed the appointment time on the day, but Jerry still answered me immediately and successfully booked the shuttle bus for the next morning.
The hotel may not be completely satisfactory, but the butler Jerry's service is really good. When I left the next day, I warmly sent him off and gave him a small gift. If I bring children in the future, I will choose MGM.

Facilities: The hotel has a complete range of entertainment projects, which is very suitable for parent-child travel. The swimming pool is heated and looks very beautiful.
Hygiene: There is no problem with hygiene, but there was a puddle of water on the floor when I changed rooms on the second night. It was very slippery and I fell directly. You may need to pay attention to the problem of slippery floors. I took a shower outside the bathroom and it was very slippery.
MGM has a very good business, so it will be very slow to wait for the cleaning to be completed. If you come to check in around 15:00, you will basically have to wait until around 17:00. If you need to check in at MGM during the peak season, it is recommended not to check in at 15:00. You can go out and play before coming back, or go to the hotel to complete the formalities and store your luggage and go out to play. It may be better to check in during the off-peak hours.

As soon as I landed, I received a call from the butler link. In recent years, major hotels and homestays in China have launched butler services, and MGM has also launched this service with the times.
Speaking of which, I really want to complain about the bureaucracy in the back office of MGM Sanya
I originally planned to book a three-day parent-child package and a three-day poolside package. Later, I thought that the poolside was a bit small with two children. I wanted to cancel the order ten minutes after placing the order and re-order the three-day parent-child package, but the hotel disagreed and said yes. I really hope that I will continue to stay, let me set the parent-child package first, and then agree to give me a refund! Just such a trivial matter, Ctrip helped me communicate for three days, and the butler link helped me communicate for a day before agreeing to give me a refund. Then, the most disgusting thing happened to me! After I refunded the order, I went to the parent-child package and found that they adjusted the price in seconds, increasing by 600 yuan! Simply speechless!
Including ordering food, if you place the wrong order, and the difference is 100 yuan, the hotel will keep calling you, and the room will be called after the phone is called, so that you can quickly make up the money!
When the back office is doing something, have you ever thought about how much pressure your brothers and sisters in the front office will be under? I really want to find the theory and theory of the people who do these things directly. I apologize, I have been actively helping us coordinate various things, help us get express delivery, hope we will not affect the mood of the journey because of these things...
Originally, we were ready to live in MGM again, because of the housekeeper link, we decided to book another day before returning.
The front desk depar**ent of the service industry is more important than everything else. Now the competition in the hotel industry is so fierce, I hope that MGM, which has added a butler service, can truly hear the voice of customers, and it will get better and better.

Before checking in, I found on the website that the price of the hotel's garden view was reduced by 300. I called Ctrip to cancel the order and re-book. Ctrip agreed and told me to communicate with MGM to make an order first to ensure that I would stay, and then cancel the order. I immediately opened the website to book a room, and I was shocked to find that the price of the garden view room had increased. The outrageous thing was that it increased to a price far higher than one-third of the deluxe sea view room. I informed Ctrip's customer service of the situation. Ctrip's customer service had seen the price when communicating with me at that time, and was also confused by this bizarre price operation. Later, Ctrip gave a good solution. This is a later story. The second thing is that when I arrived at the hotel, I was arranged a golf room. I said that the garden view room I booked at that time was more expensive than the golf room and should be better than the golf room. A few suggestions: 1. Children's club activities require parents to accompany them, even if it is a simple handicraft class, even if the child is 12 years old, children are not allowed to participate independently, which shows that the hotel does not dare to take responsibility. But dumping a baby has become a parent's dream. To participate in activities, children can only sacrifice the adult's time to accompany them all the way. How do the interest classes in the society do it? Early delivery and late pick up are more humane.
2. There is no one to guide the guest to the room after checking in, and there is no one to guide the fork in the road. This is the first time that I have encountered such a situation when I have stayed in a hotel in Sanya for many times. I often see lost customers lose their temper, and I also dragged a large bag and a small bag to ask around to find the maze-like elevator üõó How inconvenient for an older person. It may be the hotel's reason that guests can't manage to come.
There is no perfect hotel, only the right mood!

Finally, the selected photos were made into albums to make up for the family photos that were not taken during the epidemic. Finally, I would like to thank the housekeepers Sean and Grace during this stay. They responded quickly and responded quickly. They also gave you a small souvenir when they parted, and gave you a five-star praise.

msg:It's been a long time since I stayed at the hotel in Yalong Bay. I heard that the parents and children here are doing well, so I brought the children to try it out. The overall feeling of staying is average:
1: The location is good. It takes about 10 minutes to walk to the commercial streets such as Baihua Valley and Yalong Bay Square. The hotel can directly access the beach.
2: The overall decoration is still a bit old, but it is clean. The price is usually more than 1,000, and the price is low when the peak is more than 2,000.
3: The service is really average. First of all, there are often several cleaning cars in the corridor of the room. The service staff will not say hello when they see the guests, and even the cleaning cars will not speak when they block the road;
4: When I checked in, I knew it was a Ctrip reservation, and I specifically said to let the customer service of the hotel Ctrip team scan the code. After I added it, I saw that the hotel learns to surf with a 10-minute experience ticket. Wechat asked the customer service and said that the room is not included. The problem is When I booked a room, there was no package included. I asked if I could pay for it. They said that it was only for an hour, and my child couldn't play for so long. As a result, I went to the front desk myself, and they gave me the experience without saying anything.
5: Because it is a parent-child hotel, there are really many children, and the hotel's sound insulation is very poor. After 10 o'clock in the evening, there are little friends running and playing in the corridor.
6: There are three restaurants for breakfast that are very general
Overall, the experience of staying in is average, and the service is not five-star

This locomotive is exclusively used for hotel guests to take pictures. The most hateful thing is to consult other staff Ask if you can take a picture, get a positive answer before approaching the locomotive! As a result, it causes third-degree burns!

üçÉEnvironment: Yalong Bay is facing C. There are several swimming pools in the hotel. They are all equipped with deck chairs. There are also deck chairs on the beach. It is very comfortable to lie down without going into the water. The green coverage rate is also high. After going out to sea, look back. Gao Mei is the most conspicuous.
üîîService: Grace is really good~ I like it, and I also gave a piece of fruit. The overall service is very satisfactory. The staff will greet you every time you go out. The experience is very good. There will be a band singing in the hotel every afternoon at tea time, and you can hear it on the balcony upstairs. There are also performances on the pool stage in the evening-there are also many parent-child activities. You can order takeaways, but takeaways cannot enter the interior of the hotel. They will be placed on the glass table in the lobby due to security issues and can be taken downstairs.

It‚Äôs a pity that I didn‚Äôt experience land surfing and sea castles. Because of the big waves, the sea castles were not opened, but when I was about to leave, I saw it started to build. Hahahaha, I can only experience it next time~
